features: YOUR CHILDS' COMFORT MATTERS - Your kids deserve a cushy & supportive travel neck pillow when they fall asleep in the car. With BCOZZY Pillow, sleeping on car rides and airplanes feels like sleeping in bed at home. Available in two sizes for kids, the Small size for kids ages 3-7 Y/O and the Medium size for kids ages 8-12 Y/O.

KEEPS CHILD'S HEAD STABLE AND NECK PAIN-FREE - BCOZZY pillow is structured to keep your child's head comfortably stable and prevent neck pain in short and long rides. The curved custom-made Velcro system enables a perfect fit to a child's neck. There is no need to worry about your child's head falling forward or flopping around.

PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN SOFTNESS AND FIRMNESS - Breathable fabric shell, made of cozy microfleece and cool microsuede, filled with soft BOUNCE BACK down alternative, provide adequate comfort for the neck and head and makes every ride a comfortable experience.

EASY TO CARRY AND KEEP CLEAN- Fully machine washable, soft and flexible, very lightweight, and comes with a carry case to keep it clean. The snap loop in the back of the pillow makes it easy to clip it to the kids' backpack, suitcase, and car seat.

MAKES A PERFECT GIFT- Surprise your friends and family with a great and functional gift that will help them sleep longer and better on road trips, and airplane flights. The BCOZZY travel pillow is a preferable travel accessory and gift for kids.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Comfort of BCOZZY: Making Travel Soothing for Moms Experience soothing travels with BCOZZY. Learn how our travel pillow can transform any journey into a relaxing escape for all mothers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and supportive for air travel
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this Bcozzy Neck Brace Pillow as a replacement for an old neck pillow. I travel internationally on long-haul flights several times a year. This pillow is a game changer. It is soft and comfortable yet very supportive. It works well for me whether I am in a window seat or an aisle seat. I can use my Airpods or over the ear noise canceling headphones without interference while using it. The back of the pillow is flat so it does not interfere with resting my head comfortably against the seat back. It wraps up nicely in the storage bag that comes with it. I appreciate that it is machine washable and maintains it fullness and support after washing. The construction and stitching is quite good and I am confident it will provide many years of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BCOZZY Neck Pillow: 5/5 Stars for Ultimate Comfort!"
reviews.reviewText: The BCOZZY Neck Pillow has become my travel essential, deserving an emphatic 5/5 stars for its unparalleled comfort and thoughtful design. This pillow is a game-changer, offering optimal neck and head support during long journeys. The innovative wrap-around design cradles the neck, providing a cozy and secure feeling. The plush fabric adds a luxurious touch, making it a delight for extended use. Whether on planes, trains, or road trips, the BCOZZY Neck Pillow consistently delivers a relaxing experience. The adjustable closure ensures a custom fit, and the pillow's compact design makes it easy to carry. BCOZZY has redefined travel comfort, making this neck pillow an absolute must-have for those prioritizing a restful journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the BCOZZY Neck Pillow for Travel, and overall, I am satisfied with its performance. The design, offering double support to the head, neck, and chin, truly lives up to its promise, providing comfort and stability in various sleeping positions during flights, car rides, and at home. The large size ensures ample coverage, and the black color gives it a sleek and versatile look. The pillow's construction is comfortable, and the material feels soft against the skin. However, I did notice that the pillow can be a bit bulky, making it less convenient to carry during travel. Despite this drawback, the BCOZZY Neck Pillow delivers on its primary function of providing reliable support for a restful sleep, making it a decent choice for those in need of a comfortable travel companion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works really well for me. Keeps my head and neck in a comfortable position while flying on red-eye flights. I can adjust it in a number of positions depending on which seat I am sitting in (window is on right or left, or there is no window). Material is comfortable too. Really pleased with this item!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Here are the Pros and Cons after a year usage
reviews.reviewText: Needed to get something for my kiddo because he constantly falls asleep on long drives. I decided to try the BCOZZY travel pillow after seeing it get great reviews online. Here are my thoughts after using it for over a year.Pros:- Adjustable design allows you to customize the fit. The long velcro strip lets you tighten or loosen to your perfect size.- The fabric feels very soft and plush. It's comfortable against your skin.- It provides nice chin and head support. Head didn't flop forward when kiddo fell asleep.- Packs down nicely into the included bag. Compact for storing in carry-on.Cons:- Did not stand the test of time, became less supportive after several months of usage.- The neck hole is on the small side. It has to be pulled fairly tight on my neck to close with the velcro.- Can feel a bit tight/choking if cinched down too much. It's a delicate balance to find the right snugness.- The fabric, while soft, seems like it might get hot. More cooling material would have been better.Overall, I think the BCOZZY pillow is a decent option for travel but for the price and durability, I wouldn't recommend it. It's not perfect and it doesn't last. (Not that anything in life is or does, lol) The cushion isn't as sturdy after a few months of usage and after a year, it no longer supports my 6 years old neck. Will be looking for something else. Hope this review helped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I watched several videos with people who were reviewing this neck pillow. Upon receiving it I tried it out and I think it’s going to be great for my travel! The main thing I like about it is that the back part is flat. My old outdated pillow is too thick and it makes your neck uncomfortable when leaning against your chair. I also like the material, it’s soft and comfortable. Because of the Velcro, you are able to make it looser or tighter, depending on your needs.Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I haven't traveled with it yet, but I'm super pleased with the softness, quality and support this pillow offers. I'm no longer dreading my international flight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice travel pillow
reviews.reviewText: Had purchased the smaller size when child was younger. She used it a lot when traveling and in car. We just ordered bigger size as she’s grown now. She uses it for sleeping on plane or during travel. It supports her neck and stays wrapped around without unraveling during sleep. Washes well too and in great condition even after so many years. Would definitely recommend purchasing for children if traveling.

I bought this travel pillow as I read a review (not on Amazon) which said that these pillows were the best type for people who find their head falling forward while sleeping on a plane. Well, that does describe me.I did find that I was able to sleep better using this pillow as the pillow prevented my head from falling forward as I slept, because when my head would fall forward I would wake up.The pillow is comfortable and squishes well into it's included travel pouch. The pillow and pouch also have handy loops with snaps to attach to your luggage as you go through the airports, which I found helpful. The snaps are sufficiently strong enough so that they don't easily open, but are not too strong that they are difficult to open.Also, the pillow is not less bulky than a traditional neck pillow when the pillow is stored away in the pouch.The pillow can be used in other positions as well, like side sleeping. I don't sleep that way so I cannot comment on the effectiveness.One minor complaint is that the pillow is high enough on my neck to interfere with my noise cancelling headphone, by pushing the headphones up a bit. The interference may be due to my size, as I'm small, or because my headphones are bulky. The headphones are over the ear headphones and are fairly old, so newer models may not have the same problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just road tested this on a 27 hour travel to NZ and it did a great job, not a moment of head nodding in sight. comfortable enough to leave it loose around your neck when not sleeping. Soft and supportive. Just to note that I also tried this in conjunction with the one that goes around the seat to hold your head in place but it was too much faff to use both together so I just used this one. Add in your eye mask, ear plugs, noise cancelling headphones and you'll get the best sleep available on a noisy plane.
No se merece ni una estrella, tengo alguna de las que regalan como merchandising que le dan mil vueltas.
Me gusto mucho muy cómoda y de buena calidad !!

reviews.reviewTitle: Por fin he encontrado el cojín de viaje definitivo para los niños
reviews.reviewText: con los otros cojines que vienen abiertos en la parte delantera los niños no hacían más que cabecear, daba igual ponerlo en la postura que lo pusieras que inevitablemente terminaban en mala postura. Con este cojín la cabeza va perfectamente sujeta, y no se quejan de que apriete. Cojín de viaje definitivo!
